text:
VARIDESK | Dallas, TX

VARIDESK, the desktop height-adjustable standing desk company, is looking for non-technical help based in Coppell, TX. Specifically, we're looking for Public Relations, Paid Search/SEO and International Marketing. Positions are full-time, and require 2-5 years previous experience. Let's be honest, if you're reading hacker news, you're probably someone we want to talk to. Email us at jobs@varidesk.com to get in touch.
